name: AzureNotificationHubs-iOS
summary: Push notifications for consumer and enterprise apps â€“ from any backend to any device platform
description: Azure Notification Hubs provide an easy-to-use, multiplatform, scaled-out push infrastructure that enables you to send mobile push notifications from any backend (in the cloud or on-premises) to any mobile platform.
